mapper.select: select available_balance availableBalance, total_recharge_amount totalRechargeAmount, total_consume_amount totalConsumeAmount, invoice_amount invoiceAmount from member_account where status = #{status} and account_type = #{accountType} and member_id = #{memberId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into member_account ( member_id, account_type, available_balance, lock_balance, total_balance, total_recharge_amount, total_consume_amount, invoice_amount, status ) values ( #{memberId}, #{accountType}, #{availableBalance}, #{lockBalance}, #{totalBalance}, #{totalRechargeAmount}, #{totalConsumeAmount}, #{invoiceAmount}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update member_account set available_balance = available_balance - #{transAmount}, total_balance = total_balance - #{transAmount}, total_consume_amount = total_consume_amount + #{transAmount} where member_id = #{memberId}
